benchmark_details.name: SchemaNet
benchmark_details.overview: SchemaNet is a benchmark derived from real-world schema pairs across three enterprise domains, designed to capture the challenges of multi-table schema alignment in practical settings.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating schema matching methods in real-world applications.

data.source: Real-world schema pairs collected from healthcare, finance, and entertainment domains.
data.size: 7 datasets, each with an average of 14 tables and 135 columns
data.annotation: Developed in collaboration with leading financial institutions and verified by data scientists.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on the number of correctly identified mappings relative to the total number of mappings.
methodology.interpretation: Scores closer to 1 indicate better performance in schema matching accuracy.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments demonstrating state-of-the-art performance on 5 benchmarks including SchemaNet.
